Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Imposes criminal liability for the failure to obtain medical care for a person in custody displaying medical distress
Summary: Imposes criminal liability for the failure to obtain medical care for a person in custody displaying medical distress.
LawCode: Amd §47, Cor L; add §§125.08 & 125.09, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the penal law, in relation to imposing criminal liability for the failure to obtain medical care for a person in custody displaying medical distress
